chunks.zh: 室友是巨婴，麻了
chunks.en: My roommate is a man-child, I'm numb.

chunks.zh:
楼主目前在法国留学，为了便宜找了一个三人合租房，其中一个室友简直是巨婴。
这人正在读硕士二年级，生理年龄至少 25 岁，但是行为逻辑完全是小孩思维。
今天早上起床推开门就是一股难闻的味道，原来是锅糊了，他的解释是给炉灶定了时，但是似乎不生效，然后就出门了…… 火是另外一位起床较早的室友关的。说完眼睛就转过去看屏幕，上面是一个游戏。也没有道歉……
厨房水池长期堆着他的锅碗瓢盆，只有他自己做饭的时候才会洗，说了五六遍，不听。每次做完饭就冲回房间玩游戏，做饭也是在房间玩游戏也不看灶台，好几次都是室友帮忙关的火。
半夜打游戏连麦，说了好几遍也当耳旁风。
洗衣机洗完衣服两三天都不收走。
高考完家里送出来留学，估计送出来之前就从没下过厨房，厨房安全卫生一概不知。
今天晚上把他叫出房间警告他不能再乱搞厨房了，这人也是一只眼睛看你另一只眼睛在看屏幕上的游戏，脑子里只有游戏。
你和他好好说话他只会满口答应只为了赶紧回去打游戏，也懒得整狠招对付他，实在不行自己搬家了，宁愿多花点钱。和这种巨婴对话都是在浪费生命。

和 v 友们吐槽下，顺便观赏世间奇葩。
chunks.en:
I'm currently studying in France and found a three-person shared apartment for cheap, but one of my roommates is a total man-child.
This person is a second-year master's student, at least 25 years old physically, but his behavior and logic are completely childlike.
This morning I woke up and opened the door to a terrible smell. It turned out the pot was burnt. His explanation was that he set a timer for the stove, but it didn't seem to work, and then he left... Another roommate who woke up earlier turned off the fire. After saying that, his eyes went back to the screen, which was showing a game. No apology either...
The kitchen sink is constantly piled with his pots and pans, and he only washes them when he cooks, I've told him five or six times, but he doesn't listen. Every time he finishes cooking, he rushes back to his room to play games, and even when he is cooking, he's playing games and doesn't watch the stove. Several times, other roommates have helped him turn off the fire.
He plays games and voice chats late at night, and ignores me even after I've told him several times to stop.
He leaves his clothes in the washing machine for two or three days after they're washed.
His family sent him abroad to study after the Gaokao (National College Entrance Examination), and I guess he had never been in the kitchen before being sent abroad. He knows nothing about kitchen safety and hygiene.
Tonight, I called him out of his room to warn him not to mess up the kitchen again. He also looked at you with one eye and the game on the screen with the other, his mind is only on the game.
If you talk to him nicely, he will only agree to everything in order to quickly go back to playing games. I'm too lazy to use any harsh tricks to deal with him. If it really doesn't work, I'll just move out and rather spend more money. Talking to this kind of man-child is a waste of life.

Venting to you v2ex users, and also to witness the wonders of the world.

chunks.zh: 早点搬出去是对的
chunks.en: Moving out sooner is the right thing to do.

chunks.zh: 說不定是二代啊 考慮搞好關係
chunks.en: Maybe he is from a wealthy family, consider building a good relationship.

chunks.zh: 这和巨婴好像没啥关系，单纯就是沉迷游戏吧🤨
chunks.en: This doesn't seem to have much to do with being a man-child, it's just being addicted to games 🤨

chunks.zh: 也算巨婴了，我也见过沉迷游戏的但能做到不影响身边人的
chunks.en: It's also a man-child in a way. I've also seen people addicted to games but they manage not to affect those around them.

chunks.zh: 还是自己单独租房好
chunks.en: It's better to rent a place by yourself.

chunks.zh: 要么你比他还巨婴  要么就搬出去  他的“生物爹”都改变不了这样的货 更何况你   说真的  这样的其实也没多奇葩  顶多影响你休息 卫生状态不好 爱打游戏  他又没在你床上拉屎  😄
chunks.en: Either you are even more of a man-child than him, or move out. Even his 'biological dad' can't change this kind of person, let alone you. To be honest, this kind of person isn't that strange. At most, he affects your rest, has poor hygiene, and likes to play games. He didn't poop on your bed 😄

chunks.zh: 目前只像玩游戏成瘾。给他断几次电就知道是不是巨婴了。
chunks.en: Right now, it just seems like a gaming addiction. Cut off his power a few times and you'll know if he's a man-child.

chunks.zh: @abc500 和房东摊牌了，不是他走就是我和另一个室友走，哪边给钱多房东心里应该有数，而且这种人留着就是祸害，给房东房子烧没了都有可能。
chunks.en: @abc500 I've had it out with the landlord. Either he leaves or me and the other roommate leave. The landlord should know which side pays more, and keeping this kind of person is a scourge. He might even burn down the landlord's house.

chunks.zh: 房东遇到这种事很容易解决。每周请保洁公司打扫清理垃圾平摊费用。每次厨房事故，请保洁公司打扫，加收清洁维护费。洗衣机投币使用。房间加装隔音板。
chunks.en: It's easy for the landlord to solve this kind of thing. Hire a cleaning company to clean up the garbage every week and split the costs evenly. Every kitchen incident, hire a cleaning company to clean up and charge extra for cleaning and maintenance. Use the washing machine with coins. Install soundproofing panels in the rooms.

chunks.zh: 找个妹子勾引他出去同居大禹治水 堵不如疏  还一片祥和
chunks.en: Find a girl to seduce him into moving in together, like Yu the Great controlling the floods, instead of blocking, try diverting. Then everything will be peaceful.

chunks.zh: @toneal #9  他自己都合租说明自己都缺妹子,如何给别人找妹子?
chunks.en: @toneal #9 He himself rents together, which means he lacks girls himself, how can he find girls for others?

chunks.zh: 这种已经可能危害你的人身安全，必须远离
chunks.en: This kind of person may already be endangering your personal safety, you must stay away.

chunks.zh: 这种人对公共空间没概念，也不知道啥叫不影响别人，一看就是家教不行，早点远离
chunks.en: This kind of person has no concept of public space and doesn't know what it means to not affect others. You can tell his upbringing is bad. Stay away from him as soon as possible.

chunks.zh: 经验之谈，这种情况最好的办法是搬出去自己住。有些人天生油盐不进，说啥都没用，你嫌他烦，他也嫌你烦。大家各有各的活法，何必呢。
chunks.en: From my experience, the best way to deal with this situation is to move out and live by yourself. Some people are incorrigible, nothing you say will work, you find him annoying, and he finds you annoying. Everyone has their own way of living, why bother.

chunks.zh: 这种情况在美国留学时候也遇到的挺多的。我也遇到过类似情况，包括但不限于做完饭不擦灶台，说好的轮流倒垃圾不去，明明有洗碗机也不用掏水费的情况下非得把脏碗堆在洗碗池里。我一般说他们把甘地的非暴力不合作学的很好
chunks.en: I encountered this kind of situation a lot when I was studying in the United States. I've also encountered similar situations, including but not limited to not wiping the stove after cooking, not taking out the trash when it was their turn, and insisting on piling dirty dishes in the sink even though there was a dishwasher and they didn't have to pay for water. I usually say they learned Gandhi's non-violent non-cooperation very well.

chunks.zh: 想想都窒息
chunks.en: Just thinking about it makes me feel suffocated.

chunks.zh: 可能在家习惯，有妈，或者工人伺候
chunks.en: Maybe he's used to being at home, having a mom, or being served by workers.

chunks.zh: 改变不了他就搬家吧
chunks.en: If you can't change him, move out.

chunks.zh: 去法国是不是都是学艺术？
chunks.en: Do people who go to France all study art?

chunks.zh: 抽象艺术@v2bili
chunks.en: Abstract art @v2bili
